text.div:
BreastRadiologyObservationFindings Profile

Breast Radiology Findings Section. <br>This observation is the root section of the multiple observations that comprise a breast radiology finding section. There should be two hasMember children for this node, * Breast Radiology Findings Left Breast * Breast Radiology Findings Right Breast

name: BreastRadiologyObservationFindings
title: BreastRadiologyObservationFindings
description:
Breast Radiology Findings Section.
This observation is the root section of the multiple observations that comprise a breast radiology finding section. There should be two hasMember children for this node, * Breast Radiology Findings Left Breast * Breast Radiology Findings Right Breast
purpose: Observations are a key aspect of healthcare.  This resource is used to capture those that do not require more sophisticated mechanisms.
